EmailTemplate.subject: 3 Unexpected Strategies—Just in Time for Peak Season
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Peak season is coming in hot. Given the impacts of COVID-19, this season will be crucial to profitability.
Is your store IT ready?
Based on what I know about your business at {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}, I think we have some exciting ways to help:
-
Deploy your hardware at speed & scale, especially because of COVID-19 constraints
-
Protect shoppers and associates with our anti-microbial service
-
Serve as your one-stop shop for Zebra procurement, deployment and maintenance (And not just NCR equipment; we’ve partnered with Zebra in a bigger way than ever before.)
This peak season is gearing up to be one like we’ve never experienced. Let’s make it a success by helping you quickly adapt to this new normal.
Can we find some time next week for a brief chat?
Thanks!
